QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT t.visit_occurrence_id , t.person_id , t.visit_concept_id , t.visit_start_date , t.visit_start_datetime , t.visit_end_date , t.visit_end_datetime , t.visit_type_concept_id , t.provider_id , t.care_site_id , t.visit_source_value , t.visit_source_concept_id , t.admitted_from_concept_id , t.admitted_from_source_value , t.discharged_to_concept_id , t.discharged_to_source_value , t.preceding_visit_occurrence_id FROM {sc}.visit_occurrence t JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND t.PERSON_ID = ch.PERSON_ID order by 2
